title: Azir Survey?

embed.description: 1 points and 2 comments so far on reddit

body: Is the survey referred to in the link official? How does one participate in the survey?

replies.body: Not sure of the legitimacy without know the email it was sent from, but I don't see why it would be fake.  Devs are looking for feedback all the time, and surveys are just one more way of doing that.  I hope that helps!
